snippet.title: 'Game of Thrones' recap: The first puzzle piece in a murder mystery
snippet.description: A major character returns, and has a hand in Joffrey's death; across the Narrow Sea, Khaleesi finds another city to conquer

snippet.title: Brewers win in 14th after early brawl with Pirates
snippet.description: Ryan Braun homered in the ninth inning to tie it, then Khris Davis hit a home run in the 14th that put Milwaukee ahead for good.

snippet.title: Advice to Democrats: Don't say 'recovery'
snippet.description: Election-year memo to Democratic candidates: Don't talk about the economic recovery. It's a political loser.

snippet.title: An interview with New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio
snippet.description: Short summary of Last Wednesday afternoon, I interviewed New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio in his office at New York's City Hall. Here is a transcript of the interview, which is the basis of my Monday column on de Blasio and the city.

snippet.title: Boston race makes room for those affected by bombs
In Md. court, teen takeover offers a second chance
snippet.description: The 16-year-old said he didn't think before stealing a shirt, pants, hat and jewelry box from a local Kohl's. He had fallen in with new friends after moving from Virginia to Maryland, and he followed their lead. He put on the clothes and started to walk out of the store.

snippet.title: 'Touched by an Angel' producer back in series TV
snippet.description: In the decade that "Touched by an Angel" executive producer Martha Williamson has been away from series TV, much has changed. A new golden age has brought more daring shows, from "Mad Men" to "House of Cards" to "Breaking Bad," and more ways to see them.

snippet.title: Costa Rican a celebrity after certified miracle
snippet.description: On a warm spring day, Floribeth Mora was in her bed waiting to die from a seemingly inoperable brain aneurysm when her gaze fell upon a photograph of Pope John Paul II in a newspaper.

snippet.title: John Wall had led Wizards into NBA playoffs by working hard on his health and leadership
snippet.description: With so much expected of the former No. 1 overall pick, at last the point guard has blossomed in leading the Wizards back to the postseason.

snippet.title: Wonkbook: Don't count out immigration reform just yet
snippet.description: There are signs of hope for immigration reform.
